channel.title: Max level
channel.description: is there anyway to change to total level that players can reach along with changing the max level of their skills?

item.title: Max level
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

ok did that and now its saying almost all my stats say 99/200

some say 100/200 but it is being weird. Any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 03:42:49 pm[/size][hr]Anybody??

Read full topic

item.title: Max level
item.dc:creator: @xEricEmOx xEricEmOx
item.description:
@xEricEmOx wrote:

[center]-To change Max Skill Levels -[/center]

[center][center]In Client.java Search:

return 99;

And you’ll see it twice, change them both to the max level you want.

Change the two “99” to the Max Level you want, and your done![/center][/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Max level
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

This is all i Have:

public int newheadicon2 = 0; public int totalz = totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));

there is more below it but not what you told in description

Read full topic

item.title: Max level
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

It should be in client.java
Search for “getLevelforXP”
A few lines down should say something like >= 1 and <= 99 on the same line.
Make the 99 what you want the max level to be.
Then go a few more lines down and look for return 99.
Make that the same number you used in the above line.

Read full topic
